title: Rwanda's economic growth slightly up in Q2
description:
Rwanda's economic growth slightly up in Q2

IANS Written By

Rwanda's economy grew by 9.8 per cent in the second quarter of 2024, up from 9.7 per cent recorded in the first quarter, according to data released by the National Institute of Statistics of Rwanda (NISR) Monday.
